blocks.content: A Form helps template designers in grouping inputs that have a thematic connection. Forms are semi-active components as they do not directly collect data from users. Like Tasks, they help organize the data collection strategy. They are elements that allow the display of input fields in a compact manner. It is especially useful for rapid input of data.
